name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 6, Huludao, Liaoning. The Green Town property has no property deeds, so the owners came to the municipal government to defend their rights, shouting "see the mayor"
November 5, Hanzhong, Shaanxi. Hangang Factory has been in arrears of pensions for ten years, and workers played the song "Socialism is Good" to defend their rights.
November 6, Xiaoyi, Shanxi. Feimao Supermarket closed down, owed money to suppliers, and suppliers held banners to defend their rights.
November 8, Handan. Huaming Coal Industry and Power Company, workers held banners to demand wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, Xi Jinping signed Presidential Decree No. 40, announcing the removal of Li Xiaopeng from his post as Minister of Transport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 8, Shenzhen, Guangdong. That night, a large number of urban management officers were dispatched to clean up the vendors near Jingbaina Plaza in Shajing. During the period, the snack carts of vendors were constantly confiscated. The two sides had physical conflicts and pushing, and the scene was chaotic for a while.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Cycling group in Zhengzhou on the evening of November 8
